markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jade Bauble](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3411)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 305 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bit of jade is usually carved in the shape of a duelist, or sometimes a multi-armed creature. When you activate the bauble, it magically draws the attention of foes. Until the start of your next turn, enemies within the reach of the weapon the talisman is affixed to are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Jade Bauble
